item.title: ‘The Roses’ Review: Benedict Cumberbatch and Olivia Colman Are Sublimely Acerbic Even if the Marital Comedy Pales Next to the Original
item.description: Andy Samberg, Kate McKinnon and Allison Janney also star in Jay Roach’s reimagining of ‘The War of the Roses,’ the novel about spousal warfare and its 1989 film adaptation.

item.title: Andy Samberg Recalls Seeing Tiffany Haddish and Bill Murray “Freaking Like Junior High Students” at Golden Globes Party
item.description: Samberg hosted the 2019 awards ceremony with Sandra Oh.

item.title: ‘South Park’ Creators Reveal Network Battle Over Premiere’s Trump Penis as They Joke: “We’re Terribly Sorry”
item.description: Their Comic-Con panel took place the day after the controversial ‘South Park’ season 27 premiere earned the ire of President Donald Trump and showed a version of him lying naked in bed with Satan.
